response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your needs. This product comes with a range of advanced features and capabilities that we believe will significantly enhance your experience. Given its quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $14,500. This offer is tailored to recognize your potential to maximize the full potential of the product. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 14500}
